mapper.select: SELECT E.evaluatype_id , E.rank_id , E.evalua_name , E.evalua_type , E.evalua_criteria , E.evalua_comment , E.evalua_weight , E.evaluation_year , E.half_year , R.rank_name FROM evaluation_type E LEFT JOIN rank R ON E.rank_id = R.rank_id WHERE E.evaluation_year = #{evaluationYear} AND E.half_year = #{halfYear} ORDER BY E.rank_id DESC, E.evalua_name ASC, E.evalua_weight DESC
